entities.description: Discussion with parents/guardians about the dangers of tobacco, alcohol, or drug use.
Participation in a problem solving, communication skills, or self-esteem group.
Participation in a violence prevention program.
Participation in an alcohol, tobacco, or drug prevention program outside of school.
Participation in individual or group counseling like Alcoholics Anonymous, Alateen, etc.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to their discussion with parents about substance use dangers.
Indicates if the respondent participates in problem solving or self-esteem groups.
Indicates if the respondent participates in violence prevention programs.
Indicates if the respondent participates in substance use prevention programs outside of school.
Indicates if the respondent participates in substance abuse counseling programs.
